title: I'm tired of getting my tower kills ks'd by noob minions
body: Can we make it so that if a minion deals the final blow to a tower the tower kill is rewarded to the last champion to hit that tower in the last 10 seconds? This way, I can brag to my dad that I killed a tower instead of having that glory ks'd by stupid minions. Also, this way actually makes "winions" mean something because when they kill a tower during super waves, they get the credit they deserve.

ACTUALLY, a *real big* reason I think this should be added is to let your team know you are doing something!

In numerous games, I've gotten yelled at for "doing nothing" while the team is off fighting and I literally just took a tower then backed.

"I got a tower and recalled, chill guys, I'm on my way to you now."

"I saw the game say the minions got it and I see you're in base, stop AFKing or I'll report you."

If the game had better conditions to show the Player taking towers rather than the minions, it would serve better as a note to the other players that you ARE making progress and doing work rather than "farming and not hard-pushing" rather than idly farming.

Edit: Oh, just hit me, another good thing is that seeing YOU destroyed a Tower on the other side of the map *might just remind your teammates that you aren't there with them,* thus hopefully preventing a 4v5 fight due t the mistaken belief that you are lol As well as boost morale too to those who see a teammate take a tower~!

All joking aside in this thread, I think that the op has a valid idea. 

I think we should receive credit for damaging the tower in the form of tower destroyed. Maybe calculate our damage, give us the gold in game if we deal 50% damage or greater. RG's server should record our total damage to towers, and +1 our "towers destroyed" counter once we achieve an equivalent/total damage of one tower's full health. Example: if a tower has 100 hp, and we dealt 50 or more damage to that tower, then we get the gold for that tower [tower must be destroyed within "n" seconds to claim gold]. Let's assume we get 250 hp in tower damage total for that game. This should translate to +2 towers destroyed for that game. If we play another game, and claim another 250 hp in tower damage, then by the end of that game, we should have a +5 towers destroyed. This would be a fair way of balancing the rules regarding towers destroyed, imho.
